Description: Designs, manufactures, and markets mobile communication and media devices.
Develops, licenses, and supports software products, services, and devices.
Provides online retail services, cloud computing, and digital streaming.
Offers online advertising services, search engine, and various internet-related services.
Builds products that enable people to connect and share with friends and family.
Designs, manufactures, and sells electric vehicles and energy storage products.
Provides financial and banking services to consumers, corporations, and institutions.
Facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world.
Produces and sells consumer goods, including household and personal care products.
Operates media networks, theme parks, and produces films and television content.
